name: Hltvdlm
body: HLTVDLM ======= HLTVDLM is a download-manager for HomeloadTV written in PHP to be used on systems which cannot run the official HomeloadTV-client. It can be used to e.g. download files into a private area on a shared-hosting webserver. HLTVDLM is no official HomeloadTV-project but a personal project! It is just for educational purposes without any warranty or liability.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
